name: Canals
intro: You've been walking knee deep in dirty water for what seems like hours. It's dark and your torch has long burned out. You're lucky no weird, out of this world creatures have spotted you yet. Suddenly you see a faint light. As you walk closer, you can see it's where the canal joins the castle moat. But it's closed off with sturdy iron bars grate
description: Dark and dirty canal full of rats

items.name: Iron Bars Grate
items.description: Rusty, yet strong iron bars grate at the canal's outlet
